graphic.name: Zero: Covers & Concepts
graphic.desc: Zero is a free, monthly Italian event & popular culture magazine. I started to work with It's Istanbul who has rights to publish Zero magazine in Istanbul and I was responsible for visual design of every issue. Every month Zero collaborates with a company or a brand to use its reputation for advertisement in bars, cafes, galleries, etc. You can check the dates of events and read the comments of Zero editors about various cultural stuff.
